statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Michael Buchanan scored a season-high 24 points and pulled down a career-best 15 rebounds to lead South Carolina Upstate to a 71-65 victory over Colgate on Sunday.
article.headline: Buchanan has 24 points, 15 rebounds in SC Upstate win
article.linkText: Buchanan has 24 points, 15 rebounds in SC Upstate win
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- Michael Buchanan scored a season-high 24 points and pulled down a career-best 15 rebounds to lead South Carolina Upstate to a 71-65 victory over Colgate on Sunday. Buchanan posted his fourth double-double this season. Mike Cunningham added 20 points for the Spartans (5-5), who finished 2-1 in the Holy City Hoops Classic hosted by The Citadel. Jordan Swopshire scored 16 points and Sean O'Brien scored all 12 of his points on 3s for the Red Raiders (2-7), who went 0-3 in the weekend event, their three losses coming by a combined 16 points. Trailing 38-29, the Spartans outscored Colgate 20-10 to start the second half, capped by Ramel Thompkins' dunk that put them up for good, 49-48, with 10:55 left. Tom Rivard's bucket got Colgate within 67-63 with 15 seconds left but Cunningham and Buchanan each made two free throws.
